timeline: 5 months after Chapter 15, total of ~11 months since start of Book 1
location: Level 8 (SSS raid), Elara's apartment Level 9, Community Center roof

knows: She witnessed brutal SSS raid on Gamma family for educational fraud
She's been filing false reports to Ashton for 5 months
She's fallen in love with Jax
Jax suspects something is off but doesn't know she's SSS
She's fundamentally compromised - can't turn Jax in
She's betraying her oath and service
Ashton still trusts her reports
The caste system is morally wrong
She can't go back to who she was
She's chosen to protect Jax and the Free Level
She's living a lie that will eventually be discovered
Elara Quinn.emotional_state: Morally transformed, compromised, in love, guilty but committed to her choice, terrified but determined
Elara Quinn.physical_state: Exhausted from 36 hours awake, emotionally drained

knows: SSS raided Martinez family on Level 8
9-year-old girl was removed from Beta school for being Gamma
Elara is not who she claims to be (suspects she's running from something)
Elara cares about the Free Level and its people
He's falling in love with her
She has secrets but probably isn't a threat
She kissed him and chose to stay
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Attracted to Elara, conflicted between suspicion and trust, angry about the Martinez raid, hopeful about their relationship

knows: Elara's reports show Free Level as low threat
The operation is stable according to her
Subject Varro has romantic relationship with Beta worker (doesn't know it's Elara)
Population growth has 'plateaued'
Is beginning to suspect something (foreshadowed at end)
Director Ashton.emotional_state: Trusting of Elara but with growing suspicion

revealed_to_reader: SSS uses overwhelming force for minor infractions (6 officers for family of 3)
Genetic fraud (using forged credentials for education) is serious offense
Gamma schools are vocational training only, designed to limit potential
Children are traumatized by enforcement of caste system
Elara has been filing false reports for 5 months, minimizing Free Level threat
Elara and Jax have developed romantic relationship over weeks of meetings
Jax suspects Elara is hiding something but doesn't know what
Jax was also a brilliant child who learned to 'make himself smaller'
Elara has fundamentally changed her worldview
Elara has chosen to protect Jax over her duty to SSS
Their relationship is built on deception from Elara's side
Ashton is beginning to suspect Elara's loyalty
Book ends with Elara fully compromised but Jax not knowing the truth

planted.element: Elara's lies are 'thinner than she thought'
Martinez family raid and daughter's trauma
planted.significance: Concrete example of system's cruelty, turning point for Elara

planted.element: Jax's understanding that smart Gamma children learn to make themselves smaller
planted.significance: Reveals his own childhood trauma, character depth

planted.element: Elara's admission she was wrong about caste system

active_tensions: Elara's deception versus her love for Jax
Ashton's growing suspicion versus Elara's false reports
Jax's partial knowledge versus full truth
Elara's transformation versus her former identity
System's violence versus Free Level's hope
Elara's betrayal of SSS versus her new loyalty to Free Level
world_changes: Elara has made definitive choice to betray SSS and protect Free Level
Elara and Jax are in romantic relationship
Elara has completed moral transformation (no longer believes in caste system)
SSS continues violent enforcement of genetic boundaries
Ashton's suspicion is growing (setup for Book 2)
